name: Anime GAN
description: This is a DCGAN implementation of generating anime face images using PyTorch, comprising of a generator and discriminator, trained on a dataset of 63,000 anime face images.

name: Sentence Generation
description: This project develops a TensorFlow-based LSTM model for completing sentences. It features a multi-layered architecture with dense layers, an LSTM layer, and a softmax output layer, and is trained using categorical crossentropy and the Adam optimizer.

name: Sentiment LSTM
description: The project employs LSTM neural networks in Python (PyTorch) for sentiment analysis of text data (reviews). It tokenizes text, constructs LSTM models, and requires common Python libraries for execution.

name: Digits Classifier
description: A digit classifier project utilizing CNNs for hand-drawn number recognition. Built with Python, Matplotlib, Numpy, and TensorFlow. Contains a Jupyter notebook for easy access and aims to expand with a website. Contributions welcome under MIT License.
